body.name: G-STORY 14" Portable Dual Monitor for Laptop Screen Extender 1080P Full HD One USB-A Cable Connect for 11.6-16Inch Laptop Portable Workstation(Dual Screen)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 1 hr 45 mins
features: 💎【Single Cable Connection】：G-STORY portable monitors for laptops can be connected in series, requiring only 1 USB-A to directly connect multiple monitors.

💎【Multiple-sided Cable Box】: The cable is stored in the cable box, hidden on the back of the monitor. You can choose three different directions to connect the interface, so that the cable will not get tangled and can better protect your computer interface.

💎【Adjustable cable】：The length of the thread can be adjusted freely according to your needs, with a maximum length of 70cm. It can be automatically retracted by gently pulling the cable. No more hassles with wires, making portability incredibly simple.

💎【1080P 14-inch Portable】：Anti-glare IPS panel with an ultra-thin design, matte screen, 178-degree full viewing angle, 1080P&60Hz, 16:9 aspect ratio. Compatible with Mac, Windows, Chromebook, and Linux.

💎【Smart protective cover】：The G-STORY portable external monitor features two built-in speakers, user-friendly menu controls, and comes with a scratch-resistant smart protective cover made of durable PU leather, which also doubles as a stand, providing comprehensive protection for this portable computer display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good portable monitor. Excellent customer service. May need some tweaking for Apple users.
reviews.reviewText: G-STORY Portable Monitor 14 Inch ★★★★★(4.5 Stars rounded up)The portable monitor was delivered defected - and promptly replaced with next day shipment! A one-star potential disaster redress by excellent customer service. Plug and play! Out of the box, it seamlessly connects to my Windows laptop, no complicated configurations needed. The lightweight design adds minimal weight as I slip it into my laptop backpack. Its clever design stows the retractable USB-C cable in a small compartment at the rear.While the monitor doesn't deliver a refresh rate high enough for an edge in gaming, it's quite perfect for spreadsheets, charts, videos or browsing. Clarity and color reproduction at 1920 x 1080 are crisp for its size.Con.Couldn't get it to connect to any of my devises in the Apple ecosystem. Need to delve into troubleshooting. I'm certain there is a quick fix, but I feel this should have been included as a note inside the box.Overall, good portable monitor, excellent customer service, may need some tweaking for Apple users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Second Monitor To Extend My Display While Traveling
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot for work and I find myself wishing I had more available screen while I work on my laptop. I try to plug into hotel room tvs, but that's not always an option. I honestly did not know these existed until recently. I had a friend tell me he took a second monitor with him while he travels, and all I could imagine was a huge, clunky monitor.This monitor is a great option. The screen is very clear and the colors are vivid and look great. I only use it for text/spreadsheets and online platforms, but it's more than enough for my needs. It's very easy to set up, pretty much plug and play. The cable storage box on the back makes it convenient to just pull out and immediately plug in, but I always carry a back up cable just in case, or if I need a longer cable based on available set up options.While not really necessary, it comes with speakers, a nice option to have. It's very light, and fits right into my backpack in the same pocket as my laptop. You can't even tell the difference in weight, and it hardly takes any extra space at all.The faux leather cover is nice and does a good job of protecting it. It's quite sturdy and of course doubles as a stand, which is super convenient.All in all, very nice second screen for my laptop while on the go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good performace and portability
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased 14 Inch Laptop Monitor and I'm extremely impressed with its performance. The FHD 1080P resolution and IPS display provide sharp, vibrant visuals, making it perfect for both work and entertainment. The USB-C and USB-A connectivity options make it versatile and easy to use with various devices. The portability is a huge plus, allowing me to set up a dual monitor display anywhere. Overall, I highly recommend this portable monitor for anyone in need of a reliable and high-quality secondary display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No mini-HDMI, but retractable USB-C
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. You can check out my video to see how it looks.Keep in mind, this doesn't have mini-HDMI out.Instead, it has a retractable USB-C cable built-in, which makes it convenient to have a dual-monitor setup with a laptop.It has multiple USB-A ports, where you can connect up to four of these monitors too.Four USB 2 input ports, 3 USB 2 output ports.The screen is 14" and the resolution is 1920x1080. The power usage is about 10 watts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent second screen for my laptop
reviews.reviewText: Once I got this set up properly it provides a decent screen extension for my laptop. I did have some issues out of the box mostly because I did not have my laptop set up to auto-seek drivers (due to data limiting). Once I turned off data limiting my PC connected and downloaded the proper driver and the screen connected and worked fine.Pros: The single pull USB can be moved to either side allowing you to easily connect to USB on either side of your computer. The screen looks good and resolution is decent for my use (basic laptop computing/office type tasks). See image for comparative resolution/ image quality (laptop is set to same resolution 1920*1680).The retractable cable is USB-C but the box does include an adapter if your computer does not have Type C connection. However without type-C connection you will need to power the screen with a separate (not included) power adapter.There are multiple USB inputs and outputs on this screen (3 of each).Cons: resolution would be too low for much beyond basic office computing.The cord on the retractable USB-C plug needs to be longer to really be worthwhile and you may be better off using your own cord to have a bit more flexibility.The "manual" isn't very helpful, is not well-translated and contains many errors.The power button for the screen is on the bottom of the screen and if you shift or move the screen to try to adjust it it is way too easy to power it down. Buttons for brightness are located next to the power button (making them very difficult to access).The box also includes what appears to be a USB stick, but I have not plugged it into any computer because there is nothing in the packaging to explain what it may be for and I avoid plugging in unknown devices.
